mapper.insert: insert into member (id, pw, nick, email) values (#{userName}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{email})
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id=#{userName}
select count(*) from member where nick=#{nickname}
select count(*) from member where email=#{email}
select id, nick, email from member where member.m_id=#{memberId}
mapper.update: update member set id=#{userName}, pw=#{password}, nick=#{nickname}, email=#{email} where member.m_id=#{memberId}
